artist: Delineator: After John Hamilton Mortimer; Etcher: Robert Blyth
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black : drawn by H. Mortimer   Etched by R. Blyth / To Joseph Banks Esq're, President of the Royal Society, / This print is humbly Inscribed by his much obliged and most obedient servant / R. Blyth / London, Published as the Act directs, March 5th 1780 by R. Blyth No. 27 Great Castle Street, Cavendish Square | on sheet in pencil: 2-99
title: Print
